title: Competitive BM allowed?
body: I was in loading screen and It said competitive BM is allowed but not homophobic, racial or sexist shit. I feel like people are way too sensitive on this game and the chat use to be one of the best parts of league. What would be a counted as competitive BM?

replies.body: "get rekt or flashing mastery when you destroy someone is probably considered okay but things like "die in a hole %%%got" are probbaly not.
I wouldnt risk it at the moment. Bans are being handed out left right and centre. Just mute all is my advice.

Personally I wouldn't be saying anything in chat. The ban system is built around cry babies and those wrapped up in cotton wool. Say one bad thing that can easily be taken out of context and you've earned yourself a chat ban. Spam emote is fine (happens all the time in pro play) but BM someone over chat even if it's friendly banter is a no go. It only takes one asswipe to take it to heart of offence and report you. Trust me, I've been there. The automated system really is trash.
A bit of trash talk is fine, but things like "ez" and "lol noob you suck" are neither interesting, fun nor conducive to good sportsmanship.
ez, noob, so bad, lol you suck is competitive

Dropping the disrespect.

FAP FAP FAP FAP FAP FAP.
I'd say only using your mastery or an Emote is allowed, i wouldn't use chat for that shit.
